thread.title: Police: Burglars Steal Up To $1 Million Worth Of Jewels From Store
thread.title_full: Police: Burglars Steal Up To $1 Million Worth Of Jewels From Store

author: CBS Philly
title: Police: Burglars Steal Up To $1 Million Worth Of Jewels From Store
text:
Police: Burglars Steal Up To $1 Million Worth Of Jewels From Store March 20, 2017 12:14 PM Filed Under: Kim Khan Jewelry , Philadelphia Police Department 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) â€” Police are after burglars who stole up to $1 million in jewels from an Oxford Circle jewelry store. 
The burglary took place at Kim Khan Jewelry, which is in a shopping center on the 5500 block of Whitaker Avenue. 
Investigators say the burglars got inside the store from the roof. 
They got away with anywhere from $100,000 to $1 million in jewels from a safe inside the shop.
